info.title: Firefly API
info.description: REST API for Adobe Firefly, for enterprise usage.

post.description: Generate images based on a text prompt. You may also include a reference image and Firefly will try to mimic the characteristics, such as color scheme, lighting, layout of objects in the image, etc. This task is performed asynchronously, which means that a successful response returns a jobID. Use this ID with the Get Result endpoint to check the status of the job and get the processed image result or with the Cancel Job endpoint to cancel the job.

parameters.name: x-model-version
parameters.description: Specify the Firefly model version to use for the image generation. When a custom model is used, a `customModelId` must also be passed in the request body.

Link.description: Links to check the job status or cancel the job.

x-access-error.description: Indicates the reason access is not authorized.

validation_errors.msg: value is not a valid enumeration member; permitted: 'photo', 'art'

retry-after.description: Indicates the date after which the client should retry the request.

x-access-rate-limit-level.description:
Indicates the level at which the rate limit was applied. Possible values are:
- org: The rate limit was applied to the organisation
- account: The rate limit was applied to the organization's tech account

get.description: Get the result of the job.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the submitted job
parameters.name: jobId

schema.description: Unique identifier for the submitted job
schema.title: title job urn id

Link.description: Links to check job status & cancel job

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the submitted job
parameters.name: jobId

schema.description: Unique identifier for the submitted job
schema.title: title job urn id

ApiError.description: The error within the error response.
ApiError.title: ApiError

cancelUrl.description: The URL to cancel the job.
cancelUrl.title: Cancel URL

statusUrl.description: The URL to check the status of the job.
statusUrl.title: Status URL

AsyncApiErrorV3.description: The error within the error response.
AsyncApiErrorV3.title: AsyncApiErrorV3

result.description: The result of the job, if the job has completed.
result.title: Result

source.description: Source image that Firefly expands, fills or uses to generate similar images

image.description:
The image to expand. Use a URL or an uploadID as the source for the image. Firefly only allows these listed domains for input URLs in the request:
  • amazonaws.com
  • windows.net
  • dropboxusercontent.com
  • storage.googleapis.com

mask.description: Mask image which will be used to expand the given image.

numVariations.description: Generate this number of variations. numVariations defaults to the number of seed images, or to 1 if you do not specify seeds.
numVariations.title: The number of variations to generate

placement.description: The position of the source image after Firefly resizes it. The value describes the horizontal and vertical placement and dimensions of the image in the output. Note you cannot use placement for source images when you also apply a mask image.

prompt.description: An optional text prompt up to 1024 characters. The longer the prompt the better Firefly performs.
prompt.title: The prompt

seeds.description: Array of seed image IDs. These reference images help ensure consistent image generation across multiple API calls. For example, you can use the same seed to generate a similar image with different styles. If specified alongside with numVariations, the number of seeds must equal to numVariations.
seeds.title: The seed image for each variation

size.description: The desired width and height for the final expanded image in pixels. The maximum size for the output images is 3999px by 3999px.
size.title: The size

size.description: When you provide size as input, this value is the same.

image.description:
The image to expand. Use a URL or an uploadID as the source for the image. Firefly only allows these listed domains for input URLs in the request:
  • amazonaws.com
  • windows.net
  • dropboxusercontent.com
  • storage.googleapis.com

mask.description: Required. Selected areas of a background image that Firefly uses to fill the source image.

negativePrompt.description: An optional text prompt up to 1024 characters. Avoid these characteristics in the generated image.
negativePrompt.title: Avoid prompt

numVariations.description: Generate this number of variations. numVariations defaults to the number of seed images, or to 1 if you do not specify seeds.
numVariations.title: The number of variations

prompt.description: An optional text prompt up to 1024 characters. The longer the prompt the better Firefly performs.
prompt.title: The prompt

promptBiasingLocaleCode.description: A hyphen-separated string combining the ISO 639-1 language code and the ISO 3166-1 region, such as en-US. When a locale is set, the prompt will be biased to generate more relevant content for that region. The locale will be auto-detected if not specified based on your profile and the accepted language header.
promptBiasingLocaleCode.title: The locale used to generate an image

seeds.description: Array of seed image IDs. These reference images help ensure consistent image generation across multiple API calls. For example, you can use the same seed to generate a similar image with different styles. If specified alongside with numVariations, the number of seeds must equal to numVariations.
seeds.title: The seed of each variation

size.description:
The desired width and height for the final expanded image in pixels. The supported sizes for the output images are:
  • Square (1:1) - width 2048px, height 2048px
  • Square (1:1) - width 1024px, height 1024px
  • Landscape (4:3) - width 2304px, height 1792px
  • Portrait (3:4) - width 1792px, height 2304px
  • Widescreen (16:9) - width 2688px, height 1536px
  • (7:4) - width 1344px, height 768px
  • (9:7) - width 1152px, height 896px
  • (7:9) - width 896px, height 1152px
size.title: The size

size.description: When you provide size as input, this value is the same.

contentClass.description: Directs the style of a generated image to be photographic or like fine art.

customModelId.description: Include the specific custom model ID when a custom model type is designated in the `x-model-version` header parameter.

negativePrompt.description: A negative prompt of things Firefly will try to avoid generating in the image.

numVariations.description: The number of variations to generate. numVariations defaults to the number of seed images, or to 1 if you do not specify `seeds`.

prompt.description: A text prompt to support the generation of an image. The longer the prompt the better Firefly performs.

promptBiasingLocaleCode.description: A hyphen-separated string combining the ISO 639-1 language code and the ISO 3166-1 region (like en-US). When a locale is set, the prompt will be biased to generate more relevant content for that region. If not specified, the locale will be auto-detected based on your profile and the accepted language header.

seeds.description: An array of seed image IDs. These reference images help ensure consistent image generation across multiple API calls. For example, use the same seed to generate a similar image in different styles. If specified along with numVariations, the number of seeds provided must equal numVariations.

size.description:
The desired width and height for the final image, in pixels. Supported sizes for the output images with `image3` are:
  • Square (1:1) - width 2048px, height 2048px
  • Square (1:1) - width 1024px, height 1024px
  • Landscape (4:3) - width 2304px, height 1792px
  • Portrait (3:4) - width 1792px, height 2304px
  • Widescreen (16:9) - width 2688px, height 1536px
  • Widescreen (16:9) - width 2688px, height 1512px
  • (7:4) - width 1344px, height 768px
  • (7:4) - width 1344px, height 756px
  • (9:7) - width 1152px, height 896px
  • (7:9) - width 896px, height 1152px
Supported sizes for the output images with `image4` are:
  • (1:1) - width 2048px, height 2048px
  • (4:3) - width 2304px, height 1792px
  • (3:4) - width 1792px, height 2304px
  • (16:9) - width 2688px, height 1536px
  • (9:16) - width 1440px, height 2560px

structure.description: An object with the reference image details for structure.

style.description: An object with the reference image details for style.

upsamplerType.description: Only supported with the model version `image4_custom`. The `default` setting upscales generated images to 2k. The `low_creativity` setting refines the image generation by removing distortions, smoothing textures, and sometimes adding details (like freckles to faces in close-up). This setting is recommended for generating images with human subjects.

visualIntensity.description: Adjust the overall intensity of your photo's characteristics, such as contrast, shadow, and hue. This is not supported with the model version `image4_custom`.

contentClass.description: Generate an image to being more photographic or more like art. Either photo or art.

promptHasBlockedArtists.description: The generated image does not comply to its full prompt if the prompt names artists that are blocked.
promptHasBlockedArtists.title: The prompt had artists that were blocked

promptHasDeniedWords.description: The generated image does not comply to its full prompt if the prompt contains blocked words or descriptions.
promptHasDeniedWords.title: The prompt had denied words

GenerateSimilarImagesRequestV3.title: Generating similar images from a reference image

size.description: When you provide size as input, this value is the same.

mask.description: This is a deprecated property. Use mask instead.
mask.title: Deprecated mask image

source.description: Source image that Firefly expands, fills or uses to generate similar images
source.title: Source image

invert.description: Invert mask is an optional boolen property, use true if you want take an image mask, invert it and apply it.
invert.title: Invert mask

alignment.description: Specify horizontal and vertical alignment. Possible values for horizontal=(center|left|right) and for vertical=(center|top|bottom).
alignment.title: Alignment

bottom.description: The space between bottom edge of the result image and bottom edge of the placed object image.
bottom.title: Bottom Inset

left.description: The space between left edge of the result image and left edge of the placed object image.
left.title: Left Inset

right.description: The space between right edge of the result image and right edge of the placed object image.
right.title: Right Inset

top.description: The space between top edge of the result image and top edge of the placed object image.
top.title: Top Inset

uploadId.description: The `uploadId` from the storage API response.
uploadId.title: The upload ID

url.description:
The pre-signed URL of an uploaded file. Use a URL or an `uploadID` as the source for the image. Firefly only allows these listed domains in the request:
  • amazonaws.com
  • windows.net
  • dropboxusercontent.com
  • storage.googleapis.com
url.title: The pre-signed URL

url.description: This URL expires in one hour
url.title: The pre-signed URL

strength.description: Control how strictly Firefly adheres to the reference image when it generates the image variations. 0 means no adherence. 100 means full adherence.
strength.title: Adherence Threshold

presets.description: The style presets. Specify an ID for a style of image to generate.

strength.description: How strictly Firefly should adhere to the style you provide. 0 means no adherence. 100 means full adherence.
